[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ background_color=”#000000″][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,3_4″ admin_label=”Trevor” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” max_width=”80%” use_custom_width=”on” width_unit=”off”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://blackhornvc.com/wp-content/uploads/Blackhorn-Ventures-Headshots-Philip-OConnor-Managing-Partner.jpg” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”Phil Headshot” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ hover_enabled=”0″ alt=”Blackhorn Ventures Team Headshots — Philip O’Connor – Managing Partner” title_text=”Blackhorn Ventures Headshots — Philip O’Connor – Managing Partner” sticky_enabled=”0″]

[/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Phil Title” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ text_text_color=”#7dcbb6″ header_text_color=”#ffffff” header_2_text_color=”#ffffff”]

Philip O’Connor

Managing Partner and Co-Founder

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Phil Bio” _builder_version=”4.4.8″ text_text_color=”#ffffff”]

Philip O’Connor is a Co-Founder and Managing Partner of Blackhorn Ventures. Previously, Philip was Co-Founder and CEO of PAX Pure, an industrial water treatment company that developed a unique thermal water treatment technology focused on purification of industrial wastewaters. He led the company from early prototyping and early-stage financing to scaled in-field pilot and the securing of a large strategic partnership.

Philip is an experienced investor and advisor in industrial resource management, water technology, and energy. Originally from Montana, Philip’s experience includes wind energy development, environmental non-profits, land management, as well as angel investing. He is focused on the promotion and adoption of technologies that improve resource use, an interest that started as an early member of The Biomimicry Institute.

Philip enjoys being an active mentor in innovation networks, especially helping founders navigate the technology commercialization process. As a dedicated supporter of thoughtful conservation he is a member of the Leadership Council of Conservation International. His training started with a B.A. Honors from the University of Canterbury, and an MBA in Sustainable Management from Presidio Graduate School.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_button button_url=”/team/” button_text=”Back To Full Team” button_alignment=”center” admin_label=”Back to Team Button” _builder_version=”3.17.6″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”24px” button_text_color=”#7dcbb6″ button_border_width=”0px” button_border_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_icon=”%%41%%”]

[/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”Footer and Social Icons” _builder_version=”3.18.7″ background_color=”#000000″ max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”100%” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||-30px|” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”20px||20px||true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”” border_width_top=”0.3px” border_color_top=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” border_style_top=”none” global_module=”1056″][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_6,1_6,1_6″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ module_class=”ds-vertical-align” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Based in Boulder” _builder_version=”4.5.3″ text_font=”|600|||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” header_6_text_color=”#7dcbb6″ header_6_font_size=”15px” header_6_line_height=”1.6em” custom_margin=”10px||”]
